attributes.action: Give Support And Offer Protection To The Haulage Industry From High And Rising Fuel Prices
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Withdraw the 2ppl duty increase October 2008, de-couple  essential commercial users from domestic users and implement an essential user rebate for the industry.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give Support And Offer Protection To The Haulage Industry From High And Rising Fuel Prices."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16866


Prime Minister's Office
